status.description: The status of the character ('Alive', 'Dead' or 'unknown').

type.description: The type or subspecies of the character.

gender.description: The gender of the character ('Female', 'Male', 'Genderless' or 'unknown').

origin.description: Name and link to the character's origin location.

location.description: Name and link to the character's last known location endpoint.

image.description: Link to the character's image. All images are 300x300px and most are medium shots or portraits since they are intended to be used as avatars.

episode.description: List of episodes in which this character appeared.

url.description: Link to the character's own URL endpoint.

created.description: Time at which the character was created in the database.
